entry.title: Bharaneedharan-K/Todo-list: A lightweight Node.js + Express.js REST API for managing todo tasks with MongoDB. Easily create, fetch, and delete todos through clean, modular routes. Perfect for frontend integrations and learning backend development with a real-world CRUD application.
entry.content: A lightweight Node.js + Express.js REST API for managing todo tasks with MongoDB. Easily create, fetch, and delete todos through clean, modular routes. Perfect for frontend integrations and learning backend development with a real-world CRUD application.

entry.title: Angshu09/Stack_Ecom: Stack E-com is a lightweight and responsive e-commerce cart project built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, powered by Vite for blazing-fast development. It focuses on clean UI, smooth cart functionality, and efficient local storage integration — all without a backend.
entry.content: Stack E-com is a lightweight and responsive e-commerce cart project built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, powered by Vite for blazing-fast development. It focuses on clean UI, smooth cart functionality, and efficient local storage integration — all without a backend.

entry.title: Bharaneedharan-K/jwt-auth-node-express: JWT Authentication API — A secure and lightweight Node.js + Express.js backend that implements authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT). Supports user registration, login, and protected routes with password hashing. Perfect for learning token-based authentication and integrating into full-stack applications.
entry.content: JWT Authentication API — A secure and lightweight Node.js + Express.js backend that implements authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT). Supports user registration, login, and protected routes with password hashing. Perfect for learning token-based authentication and integrating into full-stack applications.

entry.title: nwabuezenonso/task-tracker-cli: Task CLI Tracker is a lightweight, command-line application built with Node.js, Express, TypeScript (OOP architecture) to help users efficiently track their daily tasks. It empowers developers, students, and productivity enthusiasts to add, update, delete, list, and track progress on tasks all from the command line.
entry.content: Task CLI Tracker is a lightweight, command-line application built with Node.js, Express, TypeScript (OOP architecture) to help users efficiently track their daily tasks. It empowers developers, students, and productivity enthusiasts to add, update, delete, list, and track progress on tasks all from the command line.
